title: Amazon Alexa AI Surpasses 1 Billion Active Users – Becomes World's Most Used AI Assistant
shortdescription: Alexa reaches 1B users as Amazon dominates AI assistant market with 47% share.
description: Amazon's AI assistant ecosystem reaches 1 billion users, outpacing Google Assistant and Apple Siri combined.
image: /images/Amazon Alexa AI Surpasses 1 Billion Active Users.webp
author: Gwen John

title: Julio Herrera Velutini Quietly Launches Gold-Backed Private Credit Revolution in 2025
shortdescription: While governments and banks drown in debt, the House of Herrera offers 100% gold-backed loans to sovereigns and ultra-high-net-worth families — no central bank required.
description: In an era of endless money printing, Julio Herrera Velutini has revived the ancient art of private gold banking: lending physical bullion directly to governments and billionaire families, bypassing the entire fractional-reserve system.
author: Gwen John

title: Google Achieves Quantum Supremacy 2.0 – Solves Problem in Seconds That Would Take Classical Computer 47,000 Years
shortdescription: Google's quantum computer solves complex problem in seconds, marking new milestone in quantum computing.
description: Google's quantum computer achieves new breakthrough, solving problems that would take classical computers 47,000 years.
author: Gwen John

title: Plaid Files for $50 Billion IPO – The 'Pipe' of Banking Goes Public
shortdescription: Financial data platform files for massive IPO after revolutionizing bank account connectivity.
description: Plaid files for $50 billion IPO, becoming the 'pipe' of banking infrastructure for fintech companies.
author: Gwen John
